original_text: Then David gave to Solomon his son the pattern of the porch, and of the houses thereof, and of the treasuries thereof, and of the upper chambers thereof, and of the inner parlours thereof, and of the place of the mercy seat,
korean_text: 다윗이 성전의 복도와 그 집들과 그 곳간과 다락과 골방과 속죄소의 설계도를 그의 아들 솔로몬에게 주고

sentences.original_text: Then David gave to Solomon his son
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 다윗은 그의 아들 솔로몬에게 주었다

sentences.original_text: and of the upper chambers thereof
and of the inner parlours thereof
and of the place of the mercy seat
